title: Add WhatsApp sharing for fixture details
description: Implement one-tap WhatsApp sharing of fixture details, selected teams, and availability status. This integrates with existing communication workflows and makes it easy to share match information.
acceptance_criteria: Share button on fixture details page
Share button on fixture listing page
Generates formatted text message with fixture info
Different message templates for captains (includes full team) vs players
Includes deep link back to fixture page

implementation_approach: Server-side endpoint to generate formatted message
Detect mobile vs desktop for correct WhatsApp URL

testing_requirements: Test share on mobile opens WhatsApp app
Test share on desktop opens WhatsApp Web
Test captain template includes full team
Test player template includes personal status

context.user_story: As a captain, I want to share team selection via WhatsApp so I can quickly inform my team about upcoming matches

completion_notes: Added share button to fixture detail page using Web Share API with WhatsApp (wa.me) fallback. Reuses existing glance-copyable text and appends deep link. Client-side only â€” no server changes needed.
